column4: having two boxes plugged into the same switch with a a local router at 192.168.30.1 statically assigning each IP addresses. One box at 192.168.30.100 the other at 192.168.30.102. the 102 box pings 100 fine, but not the other way around. where should I start looking for why?
102 is running a default ubuntu with KDE4.
portmap is running on the 102 box... would that block pings?
